item.title: Music / Maxi Millz
item.dc:creator: farrantjames97
item.description:
Maxi grew up in a music-loving household and began his journey at an early age ... . As he began to find his own way in music he fell in love with artists such ... as Stevie Wonder, Bill Withers, Earth Wind & Fire and Aretha Franklin ...

The post <span>Music</span><span id=hspan2> /</span><span id=hspan3> Maxi Millz</span> appeared first on SUM.
item.content:encoded:
Maxi grew up in a music-loving household and began his journey at an early age listening to his parents Motown, Blues, and Soul record collections. As he began to find his own way in music he fell in love with artists such as Stevie Wonder, Bill Withers, Earth Wind & Fire and Aretha Franklin, and cites them as great inspiration. Maxi spent a large part of his childhood with his family in America, experiencing a rich culture of music in cities like New York, Baltimore (as well as London), a perfect reference point for the unique sound he has established.

Maxi Millz releases his highly anticipated debut EP ‘Captions’ alongside visuals for ‘Screen Time’. Following both ‘Danny Ocean’ and ‘MDNA’ which dropped recently, Maxi has generated an undeniable buzz and set the tone for what’s to follow. The 8-track project showcases Maxi’s falsetto and highly developed sound which is a fusion of R&B, Hip-Hop and Funk.

“The project is about relationships, the highs and lows, the different stages… from the Infatuation filled honeymoon stage to the boring routine that a lot of relationships fall into, I tried to condense all the emotions I have felt in relationships, small and big, into a small project, Captions. ‘Screen Time’ is a simplelight hearted, quarantine relatable video for a song that I think a people will understand. Bare people couldn’t see their significant others, and still can’t easily.”

Spotify
Apple Music
Deezer
Youtube
Amazon
To keep up with Maxi’s work, follow him on Instagram. Maxi is represented by Emerald East.
